title: HOW TO DISABLE SNOWMAP IN ARURF
body:
i want to play urf but i play league on a potato and my fps drops drastically due to the new snowmap. In game i tried to look for the option to turn it off but it isnt there, even tho i turned it off on normal summoner rift games. PLEASE HELP

update: I just read on the pbe forum that riot took that option off to feel the "experience" but that option for some people like me changes whether or not i can play the gamemode or not....CHANGE THIS PLEASE I WANNA PLAY URF T.T

replies.body:
Indeed, I looked into this for you and came to the same conclusion.  The toggle to disable the snow assets for AR URF is not available, as it's part of that specific game mode.  

If you're running into issues see if capping your frame rate, toggling vertical sync, or updating drivers via the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help.
believe me ive all of that just to play the game lol guess its time for a new laptop :/
